name: Bar Graph
description: A simple bar graph display running on JSON data.

name: Group Bar Graph
description: Grouped bar graphs running on JSON data.

name: Diverging Bar Chart
description: A bar chart illustrating values of different categories within each bar.

name: Scatter Plot
description: Simple scatter plot running on JSON data.

name: Scatterplot Matrix
description: A scatterplot matrix running on JSON data, for illustrating correlations between variables.

name: Sunburst Partition
description: Sunburst partition for displaying hierarchical data.

name: Box Plot
description: Box plot for illustrating quartiles and outliers.

name: Pie Chart
description: A simple pie chart running on JSON data.

name: Area Chart
description: A simple area chart running on JSON data.

name: Line Chart
description: A simple line chart running on JSON data.

name: Contour Plot
description: A contour plot running on JSON data.

name: Heatmap
description: A heatmap (similar to contour plot) running on JSON data.

name: Parallel Coordinates
description: A visualization of paired data and the relation amongst different variables.

name: Spline
description: An interactive illustration of different types of splines.

name: Donut Multiples
description: A display of multiple donut diagrams across a set of variables.

name: 3D Donut Chart
description: A 3D donut diagram and 3D pie chart for data visualization.

name: Circle Diagram
description: A circle diagram for illustrating categorical data.

name: Chord Diagram
description: A chord diagram for illustrating relations between categories.

name: Icicle
description: A hierarchical visualization running on JSON data.

name: Tree
description: An interactive, collapsible tree diagram running on JSON data.

name: Red-Black Tree
description: An interactive red-black tree. Structure of tree is incorrect, but visualization is pretty cool.

name: Speedometer
description: A simple speedometer visualization.

name: Interactive Globe
description: An interactive, rotatable globe generated from JSON data.

name: US Map
description: An interactive map of the United States.

name: Choropleth
description: A color-based informative map of the United States (or any specified subdivided geographical region).

name: Dashboard
description: An interactive bar graph, pie graph, and numerical output display for analysis.

name: Table of Links
description: A list of links formatted and generated from JSON data.

name: Google API Map
description: An isolated, interactive map utilizing the Google API.
